title: The Hunley
description: During the Civil War, an engineer working for the Confederacy develops a primitive submarine that can evade the Union ships blockading Southern ports.

title: The Treasure Train of Jefferson Davis
The Man Who Stole New York City
Wild Bill Hickok - the Legend and the Man
The Colonel from Connecticut
description: The story of Col. Edwin Drake, the first man to drill for oil in the U.S.

title: Rodger Young
description: James MacArthur plays Rodger Young. The story of a young man that enlists in the Army despite having poor eyesight and hearing and ends up earning the Medal of Honor for his deeds fighting the Japanese during WWII.

title: The Special Courage of Captain Pratt
Escape
description: The true Civil War story of an escape by Union POWs from the Confederate Libby Prison in 1864. The POWs tunneled under the walls and into an adjoining building which gave them access to the street. While some were recaptured, a few got away, including Colonel Streight [Michael Constantine] who had organized the escape.
